title: Jwalantham
plot: This socially relevant saga depicts the tremendous injustice meted out to hard-working farmers in the region, who are exploited and oppressed by corrupt government officials. Will their struggles lead to the fulfillment of their rights?

The entire cast and crew of the film are newcomers to the industry and with filming done in Shivamogga, Honnavar, Karkala, Karawara, it promises to be one of most interesting and much awaited movie of 2016. With it's unusual story line and plot, the _Jwalantham_ (qv) is one of it's kind and claims to be unique and such movie being never made.
